law.catch_line: The initial time periods for filing a final report and for making distribution to each legatee and h...

text.section: The initial time periods for filing a final report and for making distribution to each legatee and heir are extended for 90 days on a consent for extension of the time periods signed by the personal representative and each interested person and filed within 10 months from the date of appointment.
A register of wills or a court may not extend the time periods established under this subtitle.
